content.rendered:
WEST PALM BEACH, Fla., May 11, 2023 (Newswire.com) - Nantucket Whaler, the classic American lifestyle brand inspired by exploration and Nantucket Island, has launched its Spring-Summer Collection for 2023. The nautical brand's photoshoot took place in coastal communities throughout iconic Palm Beach County, Florida, known for its serene, sunny beaches, crystal blue waters and plentiful outdoor activities. 

Nantucket Whaler's Spring-Summer 2023 Collection encourages adventure and exploration with easy-to-wear pieces for all-day comfort. Shot in multiple fresh and saltwater locations to capture the essence of U.S. coastal communities, Nantucket Whaler's newest products offer breathable and lightweight fabrics for both tops and bottoms.

The collection includes shirts of sun-washed shades inspired by coastline colors in linen, cotton seersucker and garment-dyed fabrics as a core lineup for the summer season, perfect for wear on the beach or the dock. The Seaport Short, an updated version of the best-selling Rover Short, and the Navigator Pant, the next generation of the popular Nomad Pant, offer stretch and functionality in the Spring-Summer Collection for Nantucket Whaler. Unique design elements in both new bottoms include a vintage map of Nantucket Island on the inside pockets, as a nod to the brand's authentic heritage.

"This season, we've taken an active approach to truly communicate and connect with consumers through our products, and with that, have developed new items that best represent our brand and coastal communities throughout the country," said Morgan Rose, Senior Designer for Nantucket Whaler. "We are constantly inspired by life at sea and have incorporated natural fabrics to keep our consumers looking cool and comfortable while highlighting the ease of Nantucket Whaler's style."

Recently, Nantucket Whaler had an exclusive assortment of the Spring 2023 Collection at the Retail Shop at the USPA National Polo Center (NPC) - Wellington for the 2023 polo season. Nantucket Whaler's newest collection is also accessible across Canada in the iconic men's retail store, Tip Top. As the leading retailer of men's clothing in Canada, the partnership between Nantucket Whaler and Tip Top continues to grow as a larger assortment of the Spring-Summer 2023 Collection is available in more than 80 store locations across Canada, as well as online, at TipTop.ca.  

All items in the Spring-Summer 2023 Collection are available online, at nantucketwhaler.com.

About Nantucket Whaler

Nantucket Whaler is a lifestyle brand inspired by coastal communities and island boating history that dates back to 1837. The brand's heritage is steeped in the mystique of Nantucket Island and the generations of people who built a life exploring the sea. The brand's style translates the grit, strength, and endurance of those early nautical explorers into well-crafted clothes for modern consumers and brings to life the genuine spirit of the sea. Visit nantucketwhaler.com and follow @nantucketwhaler.

As a proud sponsor of the Whale and Dolphin Conservation (WDC), Nantucket Whaler supports the nonprofit organization in its dedication to the conservation of whales and dolphins through inspiring global action. WDC, a leading global organization, defends these remarkable creatures against the many threats they face through campaigns, lobbying, conservation projects, field research, and education. Visit whales.org for more information.

Contact Information:
Kaela Drake
PR & Communications Coordinator
kdrake@uspagl.com
561-461-8596

Stacey Kovalsky
Senior Director, Global Communications
skovalsky@uspagl.com
561-790-8036


Original Source: Nantucket Whaler Launches Spring-Summer 2023 Collection
